title: Design Media Transition and Creative Problem-Solving: CAD Modeling and Sketching Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental design processes and familiarity with basic sketching and CAD tools
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based digital tools alongside paper sketching and basic 3D modeling software

learning_goals: Learners can select sketch-to-3D modeling transition strategies according to situational contexts when performing design tasks
Learners can analyze and improve their design decision-making processes using the think-aloud technique
Learners can explain creative problem-solving methods that leverage the complementary advantages of diverse design media (sketch/CAD)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
